snippet.title: Fruit and Grain Bars
snippet.description: Fruit and grain bars are great for snacks, but they can be quite pricey. At 15 cents per bar, this homemade version is a substantial savings over the store-bought kind.

snippet.title: Raw Energy Bars
snippet.description: These scrumptious raw energy bars are quick and easy to make, and amazingly healthy and filling snacks. Try Catherine Newman's creative recipe today.

snippet.title: Granola Bars
snippet.description: My kids take these granola bars to school for snack, and they doubtless experience an, 'I can't believe it's not cookies' feeling of righteous swindlery. The fact that the bars are packed with whole grains and nuts, see...

snippet.title: Chocolate Peanut Butter Bars
snippet.description: These no-bake peanut butter and chocolate bars are scrumptious and quick and easy to make. Try out Anne Coleman's sure-fire recipe.

snippet.title: Oatmeal Blueberry Bars
snippet.description: These yummy homemade fruit bars are so much tastier and healthier than the store-bought version. Check out Alison Needham's wholesome recipe here.

snippet.title: Celebrating the Joys of Bar and Bat Mitzvahs
snippet.description: Planning Bar and Bat Mitzvah Celebrations With Your Child

snippet.title: Crunchy Caramel Popcorn Bars
snippet.description: Sweeten up movie night! Use Pop SecretÂ® microwave popcorn to make Crunchy Caramel Popcorn Bars the whole family will love!
